column5: Fortunately they probably won't survive the winter: the Pacu
Man............. What a way to go!!!!The should rename that fish. The Ex-Fish, for obvious reasons.
Holy crap batman  Time for steel jocks....
Make swimming in the lake only open to civil servants and they'll starve to death.

Litterally!!  "recently two men were horribly mutilated and died when the same type of fish viciously attacked and bit off their testicles...:  Is this a joke?  That is crazy.  This is totally ironic, because I had a dream last night that I lost my boys to TC.

Saw these fish on that river monsters  show with that guy Jeremy Wade, locals call them nut cutter fish . He catchs one and holds open its mouth to show the teeth that look alot like human teeth , they eat nuts that fall into the river and use their teeth to crush them .
I guess I'm safe mine were matrimonially removed years ago.....

these are definately not new people have been dumping them into lakes for years and they can survive our winters the one I caught was on corn carp fishing and they fight really good there were 2 more caught after mine and none since so it was probably 1 person dumping their aquarium .here's a pic
Thanks  have been looking for the proper terminology for that, for a long time
Didn't you guys watch River Monsters? The locals of wherever named them the "Ball Cutter"

Yea, I don't buy that story much at all. But they can survive winters here. Pirhanas too. I seen 3 caught in local waters one being pulled through the ice.  I believe the pacu's that were caught were in lake simcoe?
You made a punny! hah haaaa
Yeah....but what will happen during a thunderstorm!!!!!
